data.title: Godzilla (1998 film)
authors: Contributors to Don Bluth Animation Fanon Wiki
data.meta_description: Godzilla is a 1998 American live-action/computer animated motion capture monster film directed and co-written by Roland Emmerich. The film is a reimagining of Toho's Godzilla franchise and is the 23rd film in the franchise and the first Godzilla film to be completely produced by a Hollywood...
